name: Adventures of Jumpy
description:
https://www.facebook.com/AdventuresOfJumpy

Meet Jumpy! A hyper active kid who finds himself adventuring the world after ordering a pair of Pogo Shoes that give him the ability to jump from place to place.

Every Level has it's own Unique Environment and Creatures that come Rushing towards him, but can he Evade them to stay safe and Discover the world?

Take control of Jumpy with a Tap or Hold on either sides of the screen and test your abilities against the waves of enemies of different kinds and speed. Use Powerups that assist you on your Adventure.

This Objective is to reach the Target Distance to Unlock New Levels & Areas.

Levels Increase in difficulty, it will all come down on how fast you can react to evade the enemies.

You will ENJOY and Be CHALLENGED in this game!

ONLY the SKILLED can REACH the END GOAL!

Are you THE ONE to reach the END?

FEATURES:

* 5 Unique Levels & More to come!

* 3 Areas within Each Level that represent Difficulty.

* Powerups!

* Challenging Gameplay!

* Player Skins!

Any Donations will be assist in further development.

Much Appreciated, Good Luck & Have Fun!
